text: "Shiver" is a single released by rock band Coldplay. "Shiver" was released off the album Parachutes in March 2000. A re-release was released a year later in February 2001. ==Format== The format of the single by Coldplay is a CD. It plays as an Extended Play (or EP). Category:Coldplay songs Category:2000 songs
title: Shiver (Coldplay song)
